net.proteusframework.core.locale

Class LocalizedText

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.locale.AbstractLocalizedObject
      • net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharSequence, Cloneable, LocalizedObject, TextSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalizedLocale, ResourceBundleLocalizedText

    public class LocalizedText
extends AbstractLocalizedObject
implements TextSource, CharSequence
    A LocalizedObject that contains one text value. The getText() method is provided to get the String for the current locale. The setValue() method may be used by a LocaleContext subclass to update the text value in response to a locale change.

    Message formatter arguments may be specified to construct a message from runtime data. Note that if an argument of type LocalizedObjectKey or LocalizedText is used it will be resolved according to the current locale.

    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
